name: Turtlis.io
description:
It is a mix of retro and io stilled game made using Godot engine. You are a connon turtle moving with a and d or arrow keys. Press space or "enter key" to shoot. Try to hit all the characters falling with your gun. Try touching the yellow upgrade falling object to upgrade your gun. It will also auto- upgrade as you progress thru harder and harder levels. Can you get to level 6?  Enjoy this very addictive game.

Update Alpha 1.3:

 -Bug fixes

 -Big texture update

-New sound effects

-file still not renamed to 1.3 but it is 1.3

-new algorithms

-even more
